name: Mana (Sidestreet Games)
description:
Space

Travel thru space to find out the dark secret behind the Cosmic shards

 Play as Naut as he ventures thru space and landed on a planet filled with beings that does not take Outsiders too kindly 

Contents

Your Platformer game with a bunch of bullet hell dodge your way out and collect the Cosmic shards to find the truth..

Controls

 SPACE- JUMP

AD- MOVEMENT

 J- SHOOT

K- CHARGE MANA
